mapper.select: select version,is_force,upload_at,description,download_url, from_unixtime(upload_at,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as upload_at from version group by version desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into version
id,
version,
is_force,
upload_at,
description,
download_url,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isForce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uploadAt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{downloadUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update version
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_force = #{isForce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upload_at = #{uploadAt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
download_url = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update version set version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_force = #{isForce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upload_at = #{uploadAt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, download_url = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
